```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(fpp3)
library(readxl)
```

```{r}
unemployment <- read_excel("data/non_seasonal_unemployment.xlsx", skip = 11)
unemployment <- unemployment %>%
  pivot_longer(names_to = "Month", cols = -c(Year)) %>%
  mutate(Month = str_c(Month, " ", Year)) %>%
  select(-Year)
write_csv(unemployment, "data/unemployment_long.csv")
```

```{r}
unemployment_ts <- unemployment %>%
  mutate(Month = yearmonth(Month)) %>%
  as_tsibble(index = Month)
```

```{r}
unemployment_ts %>%
  autoplot()
```
